languages.text: {n}Лицо Хейнрикса на мгновение рассекает саркастичная усмешка.{/n} "Обычно я интересуюсь у окружающих их прошлым, а не наоборот. Я с {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}рыцарского мира{/g} Гвизорн III. Принадлежал к одной из ветвей дворянского дома — до тех пор, пока не обнаружились мои особые способности. После этого я был отправлен на {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Черном корабле{/g} на Святую Терру, где прошел обучение и начал службу во славу {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо Хейнрикса на мгновение рассекает саркастичная усмешка.{/n} "Обычно я интересуюсь у окружающих их прошлым, а не наоборот. Я с рыцарского мира Гвизорн III. Принадлежал к одной из ветвей дворянского дома — до тех пор, пока не обнаружились мои особые способности. После этого я был отправлен на Черном корабле на Терру, где прошел обучение и начал службу во славу Империума".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's face is momentarily split by a sarcastic grin.{/n} "I'm usually the one interested in the pasts of those around me, not the reverse. I come from a {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}Knight world{/g} — Guisorn III. I belonged to a branch of one of the noble houses... until my exceptional abilities were discovered. After that I was sent on a {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to Holy Terra, where I was trained and I began my service for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Хейнрикса на мгновение рассекает саркастичная усмешка.{/n} "Обычно я интересуюсь у окружающих их прошлым, а не наоборот. Я с {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}рыцарского мира{/g} Гвизорн III. Принадлежал к одной из ветвей дворянского дома — до тех пор, пока не обнаружились мои особые способности. После этого я был отправлен на {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Черном корабле{/g} на Святую Терру, где прошел обучение и начал службу во славу {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's face is momentarily split by a sarcastic grin.{/n} "I'm usually the one interested in the pasts of those around me, not the reverse. I come from a Knight World that joined the Imperium under the name Guisorn III. I was sent on a Black Ship to Terra, where I was trained. Then I began my service for the glory of the Imperium."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's face is momentarily split by a sarcastic grin.{/n} "I'm usually the one interested in the pasts of those around me, not the reverse. After that I was sent on a {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to Holy Terra, where I was trained and I began my service for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

languages.text: {n}海因里希脸上露出了讽刺的笑容。{/n}“通常，都是我对周围人的过去感兴趣，而不是反过来。我出身于{g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}骑士世界{/g}吉索恩三号星，属于某个贵族家族的分支……后来，我的特殊能力被人发现了。在那之后，我就被送上了{g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}黑船{/g}，前往神圣泰拉。在那里，我接受了训练，开始为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的荣耀服务。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face is momentarily split by a sarcastic grin.{/n} "I'm usually the one interested in the pasts of those around me, not the reverse. I come from a {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}Knight world{/g} — Guisorn III. I belonged to a branch of one of the noble houses... until my exceptional abilities were discovered. After that I was sent on a {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to Holy Terra, where I was trained and I began my service for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希脸上露出了讽刺的笑容。{/n}“通常，都是我对周围人的过去感兴趣，而不是反过来。我出身于{g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}骑士世界{/g}吉索恩三号星，属于某个贵族家族的分支……后来，我的特殊能力被人发现了。在那之后，我就被送上了{g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}黑船{/g}，前往神圣泰拉。在那里，我接受了训练，开始为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的荣耀服务。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face is momentarily split by a sarcastic grin.{/n} "I'm usually the one interested in the pasts of those around me, not the reverse. I come from a Knight world — Guisorn III. I belonged to a branch of one of the noble houses... until my exceptional abilities were discovered. After that I was sent on a Black Ship to Holy Terra, where I was trained and I began my service for the glory of the Imperium."

languages.text: {n}Una sonrisa sarcástica parte el rostro de Heinrix durante un momento.{/n} «Normalmente soy yo el que está interesado en el pasado de los que me rodean, no al contrario. Provengo de un {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}mundo caballero{/g}, Guisorn III. Pertenecía a una de las ramas de las casas nobles... hasta que salieron a la luz mis habilidades excepcionales. Entonces se me envió a la Sagrada Terra en una {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Nave Negra{/g}, y allí recibí entrenamiento y comencé mi servicio por la gloria del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face is momentarily split by a sarcastic grin.{/n} "I'm usually the one interested in the pasts of those around me, not the reverse. I come from a {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}Knight world{/g} — Guisorn III. I belonged to a branch of one of the noble houses... until my exceptional abilities were discovered. After that I was sent on a {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to Holy Terra, where I was trained and I began my service for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa sarcástica parte el rostro de Heinrix durante un momento.{/n} «Normalmente soy yo el que está interesado en el pasado de los que me rodean, no al contrario. Provengo de un {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}mundo caballero{/g}, Guisorn III. Pertenecía a una de las ramas de las casas nobles... hasta que salieron a la luz mis habilidades excepcionales. Entonces se me envió a la Sagrada Terra en una {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Nave Negra{/g}, y allí recibí entrenamiento y comencé mi servicio por la gloria del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの顔が一瞬、皮肉な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「私は普段、周りの人の過去に興味があるほうで、その逆ではない。私は{g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}騎士惑星{/g}、ガイソーンIIIの出身だ。そこではある貴族の分家に属していた….私の卓越した能力が発見されるまではな。その後、私は{g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}〈黒き御船〉{/g}で聖なる地球に送られ、そこで訓練を受け、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の栄光のために奉仕を始めることとなったのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face is momentarily split by a sarcastic grin.{/n} "I'm usually the one interested in the pasts of those around me, not the reverse. I come from a {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}Knight world{/g} — Guisorn III. I belonged to a branch of one of the noble houses... until my exceptional abilities were discovered. After that I was sent on a {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to Holy Terra, where I was trained and I began my service for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの顔が一瞬、皮肉な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「私は普段、周りの人の過去に興味があるほうで、その逆ではない。私は{g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}騎士惑星{/g}、ガイソーンIIIの出身だ。そこではある貴族の分家に属していた….私の卓越した能力が発見されるまではな。その後、私は{g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}〈黒き御船〉{/g}で聖なる地球に送られ、そこで訓練を受け、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の栄光のために奉仕を始めることとなったのだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein sarkastisches Grinsen zeigt sich kurz auf Heinrix' Gesicht.{/n} "Für gewöhnlich interessiere ich mich für die Vergangenheit anderer, nicht umgekehrt. Ich stamme von einer {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}Ritterwelt{/g} — Guisorn III. Ich gehörte einem Zweig eines der Adelshäuser an ... bis meine außergewöhnlichen Fähigkeiten entdeckt wurden. Danach wurde ich auf einem {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Schwarzen Schiff{/g} zum Heiligen Terra geschickt, wo ich ausgebildet wurde und meinen Dienst zum Ruhm des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} begonnen habe."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face is momentarily split by a sarcastic grin.{/n} "I'm usually the one interested in the pasts of those around me, not the reverse. I come from a {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}Knight world{/g} — Guisorn III. I belonged to a branch of one of the noble houses... until my exceptional abilities were discovered. After that I was sent on a {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to Holy Terra, where I was trained and I began my service for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein sarkastisches Grinsen zeigt sich kurz auf Heinrix' Gesicht.{/n} "Für gewöhnlich interessiere ich mich für die Vergangenheit anderer, nicht umgekehrt. Ich stamme von einer {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}Ritterwelt{/g} — Guisorn III. Ich gehörte einem Zweig eines der Adelshäuser an ... bis meine außergewöhnlichen Fähigkeiten entdeckt wurden. Danach wurde ich auf einem {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Schwarzen Schiff{/g} zum Heiligen Terra geschickt, wo ich ausgebildet wurde und meinen Dienst zum Ruhm des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} begonnen habe."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « D'habitude, c'est moi qui m'intéresse au passé des autres, et pas l'inverse, {n}commente Heinrix avec un sourire sarcastique.{/n} Je suis né sur Guisorn III, un {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}monde chevalier{/g}. J'appartenais à une branche de l'une des maisons nobles... jusqu'à ce que l'on découvre mes capacités exceptionnelles. On m'a alors fait embarquer dans un {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Vaisseau Noir{/g} à destination de la Sainte Terra, où j'ai suivi un entraînement intensif avant d'entrer au service de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face is momentarily split by a sarcastic grin.{/n} "I'm usually the one interested in the pasts of those around me, not the reverse. I come from a {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}Knight world{/g} — Guisorn III. I belonged to a branch of one of the noble houses... until my exceptional abilities were discovered. After that I was sent on a {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to Holy Terra, where I was trained and I began my service for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « D'habitude, c'est moi qui m'intéresse au passé des autres, et pas l'inverse, {n}commente Heinrix avec un sourire sarcastique.{/n} Je suis né sur Guisorn III, un {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}monde chevalier{/g}. J'appartenais à une branche de l'une des maisons nobles... jusqu'à ce que l'on découvre mes capacités exceptionnelles. On m'a alors fait embarquer dans un {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Vaisseau Noir{/g} à destination de la Sainte Terra, où j'ai suivi un entraînement intensif avant d'entrer au service de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in yüzünü bir anlığına alaycı bir gülümseme sarıyor.{/n} "Şimdi normalde... Çevremdekilerin geçmişini ben merak ederim, tersi olmaz. {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}Şövalye dünyası{/g}, Guisorn III'lüyüm. Soylu bir hanenin ferdiydim. Sonra muazzam kabiliyetlerim keşfedildi, {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Kara Gemi'ye{/g} bindirilip Kutsal Terra'ya gönderildim. Orada eğitimimi tamamladım, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} şanlı yolunda hizmete başladım."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face is momentarily split by a sarcastic grin.{/n} "I'm usually the one interested in the pasts of those around me, not the reverse. I come from a {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}Knight world{/g} — Guisorn III. I belonged to a branch of one of the noble houses... until my exceptional abilities were discovered. After that I was sent on a {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to Holy Terra, where I was trained and I began my service for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in yüzünü bir anlığına alaycı bir gülümseme sarıyor.{/n} "Şimdi normalde... Çevremdekilerin geçmişini ben merak ederim, tersi olmaz. {g|Encyclopedia:KnightWorld}Şövalye dünyası{/g}, Guisorn III'ten geliyorum. Soylu bir hanenin ferdiydim. Sonra muazzam kabiliyetlerim keşfedildi, {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Kara Gemi{/g}'ye bindirilip Kutsal Terra'ya gönderildim. Orada eğitimimi tamamladım, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un şanlı yolunda hizmete başladım."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
